00321 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00322 
00323 inline bool Track::SortByMomentum(const Track *const pLhs, const Track *const pRhs)
00324 {
00325     return (pLhs->m_momentumMagnitudeAtDca > pRhs->m_momentumMagnitudeAtDca);
00326 }
00327 
00328 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00329 
00330 inline bool Track::SortByEnergy(const Track *const pLhs, const Track *const pRhs)
00331 {
00332     return (pLhs->GetEnergyAtDca() > pRhs->GetEnergyAtDca());
00333 }

00457 inline StatusCode Track::GetAssociatedCluster(Cluster *&pCluster) const
00458 {
00459     if (NULL == m_pAssociatedCluster)
00460         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00461 
00462     pCluster = m_pAssociatedCluster;
00463 
00464     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00465 }

00469 inline StatusCode Track::GetMCParticle(const MCParticle *&pMCParticle) const
00470 {
00471     if (NULL == m_pMCParticle)
00472         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00473 
00474     pMCParticle = m_pMCParticle;
00475 
00476     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00477 }
